content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1697132769668{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(https://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Angelique-newsletter-image.png?id=6129) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Diversity & Inclusion at ATR

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”15″ full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1548113042283{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

United by Our Differences

 

At ATR, we celebrate diversity by living and breathing it. Our differences shouldn’t set us apart; they should connect us. For that reason, diversity and inclusion lies at the heart of our success. Professionals of different backgrounds bring different ideas to the table, strengthening bonds and spurring innovation. We respect and embrace everyone equally regardless of gender, ethnicity, culture, sexual orientation, physical ability, or any other characteristic. Here, all are welcome.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”6699″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”6997″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Fueled by Our Inclusivity

 

Our employees come from different walks of life. In fact, most of our team members identify as minorities, creating an inclusive environment to our company culture. Gender diversity is a prime example. At ATR, five women excel in senior leadership roles, setting a strong tone for the rest of the organization and providing a strong example for other firms. We believe our differences work to make us a stronger, unified company. ATR thrives because of our diverse team.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

ATR’s Diversity and Inclusion Statement

 

Our Mission

To ensure fairness, equity, and diversity in attracting, hiring, compensating, motivating, and promoting a top-performing workforce. To know and understand the development needs of our leaders and employees while delivering innovative programs meeting those needs. To mirror the rich diversity of the communities in which we live, work, and serve.

 

Our Goal

To develop and sustain a culture of inclusion and fairness where every employee feels valued and revered for their ideas, background, and perspective. To ensure our business benefits society as a whole, in accordance with our core value of simultaneous promotion of all interests.

 

Our Efforts

We are uniquely positioned to champion diversity as a means of creating new opportunities for employment and economic development on a national scale; our leaders embrace the commitment to inclusion as a fundamental business strategy.

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

ATR’s Role in Supplier Diversity

 

As a woman-led, minority-owned business, ATR has valued diversity since our doors opened in 1988. We’ve progressively matured into the diverse supplier of choice for small and large businesses alike. Professionals from all walks of life trust us to advance and enhance their careers. Because of our distinctive background and strong relationships in the MBE community, companies choose ATR, again and again, to help them meet their diversity requirements. It’s an initiative we take to heart, striving to do more than merely checking boxes. Together, we make a lasting difference in the lives of others—that’s what makes authentic diversity beautiful.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_images_carousel images=”7015,7016,7017,7018,7019,7038,7039,7040,7041,7042,7043,7044,7045,7046,7047,7048″ img_size=”full” speed=”3000″ slides_per_view=”3″ autoplay=”yes” wrap=”yes”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Proud to be WBENC Certified

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”6998″ img_size=”400×250″][vc_column_text]

ATR is exceedingly proud to have achieved WBENC Certification, the most prestigious national recognition for women-owned businesses in the U.S. Receiving this honor reflects our enduring commitment to diversity and inclusion. Through this certification, we’re now part of an extensive network that provides a multitude of support for hardworking women, including:

 

  • Targeted business opportunities specially curated for certified women-owned firms.
  • Increased visibility within corporate and government supply chains.
  • Access to educational and development programs aimed at spurring growth and augmenting our capacity.
  • Networking and mentorship engagements with a thriving community of women entrepreneurs and their supporters.

 

This milestone is a collective achievement, and we are thrilled to share it with all our stakeholders who have journeyed with us.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class=”blue-overlay custom-overlay padding-top-100 padding-bottom-120″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1517″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

 

“As a Hispanic owned business, we understand the importance of equality and inclusion and are committed to achieving these goals in the workplace. It’s the right thing to do. It’s the smart thing to do.”

 

– Andrea Brenholz President and CEO of ATR International

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Organizations We’re A Part Of

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1511″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1503″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1508″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1509″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5948″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5947″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5946″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Diversity Blogs

How ATR Will Drive Progress as a WBENC-Certified Women’s Business Enterprise

01.15.2024 | ATR International, Supplier Diversity

I am happy to announce that ATR International recently became certified through the Women’s Business Enterprise National Council (WBENC)! This is an important milestone for our company. WBENC Certification, which is awarded to women-owned and -led businesses that pass a rigorous vetting process, is recognized by thousands of corporations and government entities. Becoming WBENC-certified brings […]

Read the Article

3 Supplier Diversity Program Best Practices to Drive Mutual Success

09.13.2023 | Diversity, Supplier Diversity

The benefits of having a diverse supply chain have been well-studied and documented, proving its positive impact on business success. Supplier diversity drives growth and profitability while contributing to a strong, organization-wide commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DE&I).  People—whether they are potential customers, employees, or vendors—feel more positively about and are more likely to […]

Read the Article

La Celebración of Hispanic Heritage Month

09.29.2022 | ATR International, Diversity, Holidays, Supplier Diversity

Mi Historia In my early days, I grew up at my grandparents’ business. I watched them help customers as I played with my favorite childhood toys. I loved being with them and eventually became fascinated by their work. I paid close attention and quickly volunteered to answer the phone and assist with customers’ questions – […]

Read the Article

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • I have consistently been impressed by ATR’s commitment to the MBE community and their active participation in supporting diversity and sharing their experience and knowledge.

     

    -ATR Client

  • I have seen firsthand their commitment to the diversity community, exemplified in several ways. They share their knowledge and experience with other MBEs.

     

    -ATR Client 

  • ATR is a valuable member of the minority business community.

     

    -ATR Client

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row]
